p: Participant who met the criteria for a suspected case AND had laboratory confirmation of Zika virus RNA in serum or urine by Real-time RT-PCR [ 42]. For ZIKV diagnosis, serological tests like IgM ELISA were not used in this study to confirm ZIKV disease due to the cross-reactivity of the tests available with other flaviviruses circulating in the region like DENV [ 43, 44].
